title: Bill to increase late filing penalty

abstracts.abstract: BOARD BILL NO.   62             INTRODUCED BY ALDERMAN JOE VACCARO, PRESIDENT LEWIS REED An ordinance submitting to the qualified voters of the City of St. Louis a proposed amendment to the Revised Code of the City of St. Louis by repealing existing Section 8.06.090 of the Revised Code of the City of St. Louis and enacting a new Section 8.06.090 of the Revised Code of the City of St. Louis relating to Penalty for delinquent filing; providing for an election to be held therefore and the manner of voting thereat; and containing an emergency clause.
